nodes.bodyText: why this? is it because the github user no longer auto triggers a kokoro run?

nodes.bodyText: I don't know why, but <github user>@users.noreply.github.com as a PR author (as opposed to @google.com) doesn't trigger Kokoro (at least in my case). I also tried manually associating the email to my GitHub account on the settings page (the settings email page doesn't display the email in the list), but of course, it complains that the email is already in use. Maybe this should be configured on the Kokoro side?
